Package opengrok.auth.plugin.decoders

Class MellonHeaderDecoder

java.lang.Object
opengrok.auth.plugin.decoders.MellonHeaderDecoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserDecoder
public class MellonHeaderDecoder extends Object implements IUserDecoder
Decode basic headers coming from the mod_auth_mellon module for Apache web server. This decoder assumes that the SAML Service Provider metadata was setup with <NameIDFormat>urn:oasis:names:tc:SAML:1.1:nameid-format:emailAddress</NameIDFormat> i.e. that Identity Provider will send back e-mail address of the authenticated user and that the mod_auth_mellon is setup to create Apache environment variable containing the e-mail address and the mod_headers Apache module is set to pass the value of this variable in HTTP header called MELLON_email, i.e.: RequestHeader set email "%{MELLON_email}e" env=MELLON_email The e-mail value is then stored as the id property of the User object.
